function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Fact-checking and providing reliable sources of information","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Developing guidelines for accurate and responsible sharing of pandemic information","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strict regulations on the use of facial recognition technology,
